# `plot_dataset()` : show dataset as graphic

```{r examples-plot_dataset}
data <- fetch_dataset(type = "dino")
p <- plot_dataset(data,
                  type = "ggplot",
                  smarties = TRUE,
                  title = "My smarties dino")
p
```

# `save_plot()` : save graphic in chosen formats

  

```{r example-save_plot}
#' \dontrun{
save_plot(plot = p,
          filename = "dino")
#' }
```
